text: (gentle upbeat music)

- Spark is New Zealand's
largest telecommunications
and digital services company.
We serve millions of New Zealanders
and thousands of New Zealand businesses,
as a fast moving and future-focused,
digital services business.

We're seeing rapid
acceleration and digitization
through 5G, edge computing,
IoT, and artificial intelligence.
Spark invests in digital infrastructure

to help our customers realize
the innovation opportunities
these new technologies will present.
Everything we do aligns to our purpose

to help all New Zealanders
win big in a digital world.
From a technology perspective,

we support this purpose
through resilient technologies
that drive value and is world class,
in terms of innovation.
Our strategic focus is on developing

smart, automated networks
right around New Zealand.

We've already launched in
21 locations live on 5G.
Developing our standalone 5G capability
will unlock the benefits

of multi-access edge
compute and network slicing.

We've successfully run
two proof of concepts
for 5G with AWS and Mavenir,
and edge deployment on AWS Snowball Edge

that allows Spark to
process and store data
close to where it is generated

enabling low latency and
real-time responsiveness.

And a standalone cloud native
core solution on AWS Outposts,
the first of its kind in New Zealand.

Spark also recently ran our
first 5G edge compute pilot
for our customer EnviroNZ,

an AI powered, computer-vision
pilot on AWS edge computing.

This delivered a health and
safety hazard detection system

that uses AI detect if people
are too close to excavators
working in the waste disposal area.

AWS has played a key role in
our initial 5G use-case trials

and we are excited to
see where this takes us.

Spark also leverages AWS
portfolio of products and services
across our business to support
our own digital transformation.
AWS's continuous focus on innovation

is an important enabler
of the support we provide
to New Zealand businesses.
(gentle upbeat music)
